onTheBeginning.text: It is a storie about eery accidents. There is one dangerous mad psychopath among the characters. Some of theepisodes are parody to "Big Lebovsky". They are similar to some of the episodes of this movie, but, in the same time they are much more serious and have completely other aftermath from the characters.

About characters: The actions occure in one grim dark city where life has not been delightsome for a long time. To be in this city is dangerous. And there are some people in this negative city who appear in hard situation. It is related with some merciless and mentally ill people: 2 men and daughter of one of them. They are induced to hide in the living territory of their acquainted who fights with evil prevailing in this glum city.

Some of the episodes are parody to "Big Lebovsky". Usually parodies are funnier and tranquiler than originals, but in this time it is on the contrary: this parody is more nightmarish than original "Big Lebovsky". Storie of one of the characters whose name is Quentin was like life of Jeff Lebovsky, but Quentin compared with Jeff Lebovsky is much swifter and much more agressive than this frivolous and unserious "soplyavka" Jeff and it was completely not a goodluck decision to go to his living territory not as diserable guests and especially climb to him. He is a strong, surdy and literally iron fight man. Besides thia he is very merciless, ardent, agressive, cruel maniac. So, when people interfered in his life and impeded to his quite life these were the last days in their life. Also there are some characters like characters in "Big Lebovsky". Mainly these were a company of idiots who ran Quentin, a dirty tart and one man related to her dirty job. All these people were literally torn when they had met this terrifying person. A murder is something completely normal for Quentin.
There are some characters like characters in the movie "Big Lebovsky":

Quentin is not like some characters of this movie, but he gets into a situation like the main character - Jeff Lebovsky, who was molesred by a few rabble cretins as if he had a financial debt and was obliged to pay it and so they had to climb to him until he would pay his debt.
Sophie is a dirty tart who cares only about financial wealth. She is a very dirty and shameless harlot. In reality she has a debt in front of one human. This debt is not related to Quentin.

Mr Stephenson is a tormented old oligarch who is married with Sophie. He and Sophie are Quentin's namesakes and it is related with the mistake that the company of cretins invaded into Quentin's life as if he was a debtor.
! is a producer of banal and low-minded movies with sexual tone and in one of them Sophie takes part as an actrice.
There will be written about the characters more particularly. Sophie is in debt in front of !, but she doesn't cares about it. She is too frivolous.

Author's words: Ramon, Randi and W are spies. They live in the basement of the Ramon's house. Ramon know about it nothing.
The characters are sitting in Ramon's living place and talk between each-other.

Quentin: Oh, of course. I understand you.

Ramon: How do you know about it?

Quentin: I can read human thoughts. I know about Ramon's thoughts and I know who is he from them.

Ramon: Do you mean the snake's ability to read human thoughts?

W: Of course, I mean exactly this.

Ramon: But what if we have some perslonal thoughts and embarass them in front of you?

Quentin: I do not hear the thoughts which are not actual for me. Relax.

Author's words: But if we have some thoughts related with our common deals I will wish all of us to discuss them  aloud including you.

Quentin: Of course. I know you can not read thoughts like me.

W: Frankly, I like sso cruel stories not very mych.
